tasks.label: Publish -> MB_WebPage_site (safe)
tasks.command: rm -rf /tmp/jekyll_out && mkdir -p /tmp/jekyll_out && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build -d /tmp/jekyll_out && rsync -rtlv --delete --exclude '.git' --exclude '.github' --no-owner --no-group --no-perms --omit-dir-times /tmp/jekyll_out/ /workspaces/MB_WebPage_site/
